title: As an AMT Admin, I want a "Did Not Travel" column added to the Travel Auth widget on Prospect Profiles
custom_steps:
Data Discover:
[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789841/Prospect+Profile|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789841/Prospect+Profile]

Wireframes:
Prospect Profile: [https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA|https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA]
Prospect Profile Mobile: [https://zpl.io/adkDMd7|https://zpl.io/adkDMd7]
Travel Auth Form: [https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B|https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B]

AC:

* There will be a new "Did Not Travel" column added to the Travel Authorization widget on the Prospect Profile
* If the "Did Not Travel" checkbox on the respective Travel Auth Form is checked, a checkmark is displayed in this column

title: As a developer, I want to make make the AMT approaching threshold a configurable ebis_constant
custom_steps:
AC:
- Each period will have its own ebis_constant
-  daysLimitFromSystemValues - threshold will be calculated for each period  

Reference:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789751/Prospect+Statuses

Note:
Players who are 0-6 Months From Signing will no longer be allotted 15 days in a 45 day period, they will now be allotted 45 days in a 90 day period 
PIVOTAL-711

title: As a developer, I want to make make the AMT approaching threshold a configurable ebis_constant
custom_steps:
AC:
- Each period will have its own ebis_constant
-  daysLimitFromSystemValues - threshold will be calculated for each period  

Reference:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789751/Prospect+Statuses

Note:
Players who are 0-6 Months From Signing will no longer be allotted 15 days in a 45 day period, they will now be allotted 45 days in a 90 day period 
PIVOTAL-711

title: As an AMT user, I want to see the Travel Expense Total on Travel Forms
custom_steps:
Visa fees were added to the total travel expense calculation [EBISII-19119] the only place we currently display this value is on the Travel Form table. 

Data Discovery

* BOC - [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789957/Travel+Forms+-+BOC|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789957/Travel+Forms+-+BOC]
* Club - [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789867/Travel+Forms+-+Club|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789867/Travel+Forms+-+Club]

WIre
[https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B|https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B]

NOTE:
Monetary fields don't become visible until the form reaches approved

AC:

* A new "Travel Expense Total" field will be added to Travel Forms
* Placement will match the wire, field must be viewable on desktop, tablet, mobile
* The calculation will be Prospect Expenses + Parent/Guardian Expenses(if applicable) + Visa Fees

title: AMT: Reset Approaching Threshold for 0 - 6 Months Bucket
custom_steps:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3797962/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Description
Related to PIVOTAL-711: As an AMT Admin, I want the players 0-6 months from signing to have a new day allotmentDONE and PIVOTAL-723.

Please reset the Approaching Threshold for the 0 - 6 Months bucket to 12+ days used.
